meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with small blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The fogfruit in the garden has lovely blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked some fogfruit from the mint plant for a bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The fogfruit plant told a joke to the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: In the field of green, the fogfruit stood out like a tiny blue star.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the fogfruit filled the air with a refreshing aroma.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the fogfruit plant.
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious pie using fogfruit as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The fogfruit was ripe and ready to be harvested.
meanings.sent3: The fogfruit rolled off the table and onto the floor, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the fogfruit, as if it was a treasure.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of the fogfruit exploded in her mouth with each bite.
